TopicTitle: Uncontrolled ship due to bug in communications

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
Operating System: Windows 11
CPU,GPU and RAM: i9 9900KF, RTX 2060 (6GB VRAM), 32GB RAM 
Mods: 0
Description of the bug: Sometimes communication is cut between the ship and Kerbin making the ship unmanageable, even after loading game to when there was communication in low orbit from Kerbin.

 

Edited February 28, 2023 by Diego_
